snippet: Mr. Fogerty, the singer-songwriter and former front man of Creedence Clearwater Revival, will write a book about the pressures of fame, his tumultuous relationships with his bandmates (including his brother, Tom) and his battle for creative freedom.
abstract: Mr. Fogerty, the singer-songwriter and former front man of Creedence Clearwater Revival, will write a book about the pressures of fame, his tumultuous relationships with his bandmates (including his brother, Tom) and his battle for creative freedom.

headline.main: Wrote a Book for Everyone: A Memoir From John Fogerty
